Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
深圳蒂爵Jewelry Co., Ltd. was formerly known as 深圳蒂爵 Technology Co., Ltd.
, the company was established in 2001 and is mainly engaged in jewelry design, processing, manufacturing, trade and sales, etc. There are dozens of large jewelry sales stores in China alone. Due to the historical comparison of operating time, a large amount of data is generated, including design materials, operational data, store monitoring, etc.....
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: It mainly stores the company's design materials, surveillance videos, promotional materials and other content. Since the company was hacked, the control server was ransomed in BTC. The person in charge of the company contacted me and asked me to help him complete the backup on filecoin. I contacted several SPs who were willing to help the company store data for free.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: I will encrypt the data, then use a script to package it into a car file and provide it to the SP through hard drive transportation. We will issue orders through boost.
